Entries.DisplayPattern: You want to dance with me? Yes!

Entries.DisplayPattern: I was wondering if you'd ask me...

Entries.DisplayPattern: I had a feeling you would ask me...

Entries.DisplayPattern: Elliott's a real romantic... I'm sure your days will be filled with poetry!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! Thank you! This one has an interesting shape...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, where'd you find that? *sniff*... Mmm... This will be perfect, grated over a fresh pasta. Thank you! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, where'd you find that? *sniff*... Mmm... This will be perfect, grated over a fresh pasta. Thank you!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmm... Back in the city, the veggies never tasted this fresh. I love it!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, wow, ! This is exactly what I was craving! How'd you know?

Entries.DialogueText: Please don't feel like you have to spend all your time with me now that we're dating... I know you're a busy person!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please don't feel like you have to spend all your time with me now that we're dating... I know you're a busy person!

Entries.DisplayPattern: I sold enough art at that show to get by for another year... that's all I needed!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm still fuming about the picnic... what a weirdo! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm still fuming about the picnic... what a weirdo!

Entries.DialogueText: Let's never talk about... that person... ever again. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's never talk about... that person... ever again.

Entries.DialogueText: If my art continues to sell online like it has, I'll be able to keep making art forever. That's always been my dream.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If my art continues to sell online like it has, I'll be able to keep making art forever. That's always been my dream.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't tell anyone, but Willy let me steer the boat for a few minutes. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't tell anyone, but Willy let me steer the boat for a few minutes.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, that was deeply relaxing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, that was deeply relaxing.

Entries.DialogueText: I love the weather in Stardew Valley, but seeing a different climate now and then helps put things into perspective.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love the weather in Stardew Valley, but seeing a different climate now and then helps put things into perspective.

Entries.DialogueText: The shape of the waves here is awe inspiring.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The shape of the waves here is awe inspiring.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if I could ever capture that sort of formlessness in a sculpture.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if I could ever capture that sort of formlessness in a sculpture.

Entries.DialogueText: I like the heat as long as I'm keeping perfectly still. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like the heat as long as I'm keeping perfectly still.

Entries.DialogueText: Mmm, I bet the trees around here would make for an interesting medium to work with.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmm, I bet the trees around here would make for an interesting medium to work with.

Entries.DialogueText: Though Willy probably wouldn't be happy with me if I dragged a bunch of logs onto his ship! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Though Willy probably wouldn't be happy with me if I dragged a bunch of logs onto his ship!

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder what kind of things you could forage out here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder what kind of things you could forage out here.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I think I saw some tasty looking walnuts growing on a bush nearby.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you tried the Piña Colada? I'm on my second one... hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Finally! I was starting to get worried you wanted to dance with someone else! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Finally! I was starting to get worried you wanted to dance with someone else!

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be honest. I don't want to dance with you.

Entries.DialogueText: I've realized I'm happier by myself. So just leave me be. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've realized I'm happier by myself. So just leave me be.

Entries.DialogueText: Ohh... Got it. Hah... I really don't have any luck when it comes to this stuff... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ohh... Got it. Hah... I really don't have any luck when it comes to this stuff...

Entries.DialogueText: I don't want to see you for a while... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't want to see you for a while...

Entries.DialogueText: You caused a lot of grief with what you did... but I'm ready to put the past behind us. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You caused a lot of grief with what you did... but I'm ready to put the past behind us.

Entries.DialogueText: I came for the sound of the ocean. Beautiful, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I came for the sound of the ocean. Beautiful, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: So why did you become a farmer?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So why did you become a farmer?

Entries.DialogueText: I want to make tons of money.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I want to make tons of money.

Entries.DialogueText: It's more "real" than living in the city.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's more "real" than living in the city.

Entries.DialogueText: To follow in Grandpa's footsteps.
Entries.DisplayPattern: To follow in Grandpa's footsteps.

Entries.DialogueText: I wanted to escape my old life.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanted to escape my old life.

Entries.DialogueText: So are you making as much money as you hoped?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So are you making as much money as you hoped?

Entries.DialogueText: Spending time in nature is very rewarding.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Spending time in nature is very rewarding.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm. That seems kind of shallow, doesn't it? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm. That seems kind of shallow, doesn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey... That's pretty much the reason I came here, too! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey... That's pretty much the reason I came here, too!

Entries.DialogueText: I wanted to connect with nature more...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanted to connect with nature more...

Entries.DialogueText: That's very sweet to honor your grandfather like that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's very sweet to honor your grandfather like that.

Entries.DialogueText: Where did all these plants come from? It's a surprise, but I'm not complaining...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Where did all these plants come from? It's a surprise, but I'm not complaining...

Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess everyone in town was scared of that strange rain? I had no idea... I just thought it was incredible!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Imagine if this rain lasted all summer... The plants would take over the entire valley!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. Oh, you want to talk?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. Oh, you want to talk?

Entries.DialogueText: The landscape around here gives me a lot of ideas. The terrain is almost like a sculpture itself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The landscape around here gives me a lot of ideas. The terrain is almost like a sculpture itself.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't make art for money. It's just an urge that I have.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't make art for money. It's just an urge that I have.

Entries.DialogueText: Farming seems like a very rewarding profession. You get to create delicious food for everyone! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Farming seems like a very rewarding profession. You get to create delicious food for everyone!

Entries.DialogueText: You're probably busy. Sorry.

Entries.DisplayPattern: We both live outside of town. Does that mean something?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Farm animals are wonderful, too.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been having fresh salads almost every day.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you figured out what you're going to use for our grange display tomorrow?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Should we go to the Spirit's Eve festival tomorrow night?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Breathe deep... can you smell that? That tells me it's mushroom season.

Entries.DialogueText: I had a nice, relaxing time today. How did your day go?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had a nice, relaxing time today. How did your day go?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Everything worked out perfectly for me. I'm very lucky.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I never thought I'd receive a mermaid's pendant so soon after moving here! I'm happy about it, though.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder who lived here before us?
